title: Momentum Breakout Strategy
text:
Key points for momentum breakout:
- Volume must be 2x average
- Wait for pullback to 20 EMA
- Stop loss below breakout candle low
- Target 2:1 risk/reward minimum

This strategy works best during high volatility periods.

title: Swing Trading Checklist
text:
Swing trading checklist:
- Identify overall trend on weekly chart
- Enter on daily chart pullback to key moving average
- Use weekly support/resistance for targets
- Hold through minor fluctuations

Time horizon: 3-7 days typically.

title: Scalping Rules
text:
Scalping rules:
- Only trade during high volume hours (9:30-11:30 AM, 2-4 PM EST)
- Maximum 5 trades per day
- Cut losses quickly - no exceptions
- Take profits at predetermined targets

Requires quick decision making and strict discipline.

title: GBP/USD Trade Journal
text: Another successful GBP/USD momentum play. Entry at 1.2850 on volume spike above 20 EMA pullback. Target hit perfectly at 1.2900 (+50 pips). Risk was well defined below the breakout candle at 1.2835.

title: Risk Management Principles
text:
Core risk management principles:
1. Never risk more than 1% per trade
2. Use stop losses on every trade
3. Maintain 2:1 minimum risk/reward
4. Keep detailed trade journal

These rules have been tested over years of trading.

title: Market Psychology Notes
text:
Understanding market psychology:
- Fear and greed drive most market movements
- Overconfidence leads to bigger losses
- FOMO (Fear of Missing Out) causes poor entries
- Patience is key to successful trading

Emotional control is as important as technical analysis.

title: EUR/JPY Analysis
text: EUR/JPY forming ascending triangle on 4H chart. Key resistance at 150.80. Watching for breakout above this level with volume confirmation. Stop would be below triangle base at 149.50.

title: Prop Firm Rules
text:
Important prop firm rules:
- Daily loss limit: 5%
- Maximum drawdown: 10%
- No trading during news events
- Must follow 1% risk rule strictly

Violating these can lead to account closure.

title: Technical Analysis Fundamentals
text:
Technical analysis is based on three key assumptions:
1. Price discounts everything
2. Prices move in trends
3. History tends to repeat itself

Support and resistance levels are crucial for entry and exit timing.

title: US30 Trade Setup
text: US30 showing strong bullish momentum above key moving averages. RSI oversold bounce triggered buying interest. Looking for continuation higher with volume confirmation. Stop below recent swing low.

title: Stop Loss Strategies
text:
Different stop loss strategies:
- Fixed pip stop (e.g., 20 pips)
- ATR-based stop (2x ATR)
- Support/resistance stop
- Volatility stop

Choose based on the trading strategy and market conditions.

title: Trading Session Analysis
text:
Best trading sessions:
- London: 08:00-12:00 GMT
- New York: 13:00-17:00 GMT
- Asian: 00:00-04:00 GMT

Overlap periods offer highest volatility and best opportunities.

title: Gold Trading Notes
text: Gold (XAU/USD) responding well to momentum strategy. Current pullback to 20 EMA offers good entry opportunity. Stop below key support level. Risk/reward ratio is favorable at current levels.

title: Market Correlation Study
text:
Correlations to watch:
- EUR/USD vs GBP/USD (positive)
- Gold vs USD Index (negative)
- Oil vs CAD (positive)
- S&P 500 vs VIX (negative)

Understanding these helps predict market movements.

title: Position Sizing Calculator
text:
Position sizing formula:
Account Size × Risk % ÷ Stop Loss Distance = Position Size

Example: $10,000 × 2% ÷ 50 pips = 4 mini lots

Always calculate position size before entering any trade.

title: Volatility Trading Approach
text:
Trading high volatility periods:
- Wait for clear breakouts
- Use wider stops
- Take partial profits
- Monitor risk/reward constantly

Volatility creates both opportunity and risk.

title: News Trading Rules
text:
News trading guidelines:
- Avoid trading 30 min before/after major news
- Use wider stops during news volatility
- Wait for initial spike to settle
- Consider using pending orders

News can create unexpected market movements.

title: Monthly Performance Review
text:
October 2025 Review:
- Total trades: 47
- Win rate: 68%
- Average risk/reward: 1:2.3
- Largest winning trade: +85 pips
- Largest losing trade: -35 pips

Strong month with consistent discipline.

title: Stress Management in Trading
text:
Managing trading stress:
- Take regular breaks every 2 hours
- Practice deep breathing exercises
- Don't chase losses
- Keep a trading journal
- Remember: it's just business

Mental health is crucial for long-term success.

title: EURAUD Trade Analysis
text: EURAUD showing classic head and shoulders pattern on daily timeframe. Neckline broken with strong volume. Target projects to 1.6450 area. Stop above recent high at 1.6850. Risk/reward favorable.
